entries.text: Thank you for calling StellarTech Customer Support. Please briefly state the reason for your call.
I'm calling about a billing issue. I think I've been overcharged on my latest bill. I'm seeing an incorrect amount.
Thank you for calling StellarTech. My name is Alex, how can I help you today?
Hi Alex. As I mentioned to the automated system, I believe I've been overcharged. The bill shows an incorrect amount. I was expecting $79.99, but it's showing $129.99.
I understand. Let me pull up your account. Can you please verify the last four digits of your account number and your zip code?

Thank you. One moment while I access your account... Okay, I see the charge here. It does appear there's an unauthorized charge of $50 for a 'Premium Streaming Package' that was added on [DATE]. Did you authorize this charge?

Absolutely not! I never authorized any premium streaming package. This is an unauthorized charge. I need this removed immediately. Actually, I want to speak to a supervisor about this. This is ridiculous!

I understand your frustration. I can certainly look into removing the charge. However, since it's an unauthorized charge and to expedite the process, I can transfer you to a supervisor who can immediately issue a credit back to your account. Would that be alright?
Yes, please. That sounds much better. I definitely need a credit back.
Okay, one moment while I transfer you to my supervisor. Her name is Sarah. Please explain the situation to her, and she'll be able to assist you further. Thank you for your patience.
Thank you for calling StellarTech. My name is Sarah, and I'm a supervisor. Alex mentioned you're calling about an unauthorized charge?

Yes, that's right. I was overcharged on my bill. There's a $50 charge for a premium streaming package that I never authorized. It's an incorrect amount and I want it removed and a credit back to my account.

I understand. I apologize for the inconvenience this has caused you. I've reviewed your account, and I can confirm that the premium streaming package was added without your authorization. I have now removed the package and I am issuing a $50 credit back to your account. You should see this reflected in your account within 1-2 business days. The new bill should reflect the correct amount.
Okay, great! Thank you so much for resolving this so quickly. I really appreciate it.
You're very welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's all. Thank you again!
Have a wonderful day, and thank you for being a valued StellarTech customer.
Thank you for calling StellarTech. Goodbye.
